info.title: Benefits Claims
info.description:
## Background

The Benefits Claims API Version 2 lets internal consumers: 

-   Retrieve existing claim information, including status, by claim ID
-   Automatically establish an Intent To File (21-0966) in VBMS

Additional functionality will be added over time.

You should use the [Benefits Claims API Version 1](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/claims?version=current) if: 

-   You are not an internal consumer, and/or
-   You want automatic establishment of disability compensation claims in Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS) or power of attorney (POA)
    
## Technical Overview

This API accepts a payload of requests and responses with the payload identifying the claim and Veteran. Responses provide the submission’s processing status. Responses also provide a unique ID which can be used with the appropriate GET endpoint to return detailed, end-to-end claims status tracking. 

End-to-end claims tracking provides the status of claims as they move through the submission process, but does not return whether the claim was approved or denied. 

### Claim statuses

-   Pending - the claim is successfully submitted to Lighthouse
-   Errored -  the submission encountered upstream errors
-   Canceled -  the claim was identified as a duplicate or another issue caused the claim to be canceled. For duplicate claims,  the tracking of the claim's progress happens under a different Claim ID . 

Other statuses this API returns align with the [VA.gov](http://va.gov/) [claim status descriptions](https://www.va.gov/resources/what-your-claim-status-means/), which are:

-   Claim received
-   Initial review
-   Evidence gathering, review, and decision
-   Preparation for notification
-   Complete

### Finding a Veteran's unique VA ID

This API uses a unique Veteran identifier to identify the subject of each API request. This Veteran identifier can be retrieved by passing the Veteran’s first name, last name, DOB, and SSN to the ‘/veteran-id’ endpoint. This identifier should then be used as the Veteran ID parameter in request URLs.

Note: though Veteran identifiers are typically static, they may change over time. If a specific Veteran ID suddenly responds with a ‘404 not found’ error, the identifier may have changed. It’s a good idea to periodically check the identifier for each Veteran.

### Authentication and authorization

To make an API request, use our [client credentials grant](https://developer.va.gov/explore/authorization/docs/client-credentials?api=claims) to receive an [OAuth token](https://oauth.net/2/). 

### Test data for sandbox environment use

We use mock [test data in the sandbox environment](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-api-clients/blob/master/test_accounts.md). Sandbox test data and test users for the Benefits Claims API are valid for all versions of the API.

tags.name: Veteran Identifier
tags.description: Allows authenticated veterans and veteran representatives to retrieve a veteran's id.

tags.name: Claims
tags.description: Allows authenticated and authorized users to access claims data for a given Veteran. No data is returned if the user is not authenticated and authorized.

tags.name: 5103 Waiver
tags.description: Allows authenticated and authorized users to file a 5103 Notice Response on a claim.

tags.name: Intent to File
tags.description: Allows authenticated and authorized users to automatically establish an Intent to File (21-0966) in VBMS.

productionOauth.description: This API uses OAuth 2 with the authorization code grant flow. [More info](https://developer.va.gov/explore/authorization?api=claims)

sandboxOauth.description: This API uses OAuth 2 with the authorization code grant flow. [More info](https://developer.va.gov/explore/authorization?api=claims)

post.description: Allows authenticated and authorized users to retrieve a Veteran's ID.

errors.title: invalid value for SSN
errors.detail: blank is not valid for SSN

firstName.description: First name of Veteran being represented

lastName.description: Last name of Veteran being represented

birthdate.description: Date of birth of Veteran being represented, in iso8601 format

get.summary: Find all benefits claims for a Veteran.

id.description: Claim ID in VBMS. If a claim was submitted with Lighthouse and not successfully established upstream, it could have a null claimId.

claimDate.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD the claim was first filed

phaseChangeDate.description: The date that the claim changed to its current phase

developmentLetterSent.description: If true, a development letter has been sent to the claimant regarding a benefit claim

decisionLetterSent.description: If true, a decision letter has been sent to the claimant regarding a benefit claim

documentsNeeded.description: If true, the claim requires additional documents to be submitted

evidenceWaiverSubmitted5103.description: If true, indicates a decision has been requested and/or a Waiver 5103 has been submitted

get.description: Retrieves a specific claim for a Veteran

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the claim being requested

data.description: Claim with some details for the given Veteran info

id.description: Claim ID in VBMS. If a claim was submitted with Lighthouse and not successfully established upstream, it could have a null claimId.

contentions.description: The contentions being submitted with a claim

claimDate.description: The date a claim was filed

currentPhaseBack.description: Indicates whether the current phase is moving backward.

latestPhaseType.description: The most current phase for the claim

phaseChangeDate.description: The date that the claim changed to its current phase

phase1CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the claim received phase.

phase2CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the initial review phase.

phase3CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the gathering of evidence phase.

phase4CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the reviewing of evidence phase.

phase5CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the preparation for decision phase.

phase6CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the pending decision approval phase.

phase7CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the preparation for notification phase.

phase8CompleteDate.description: Completed date of the completed phase.

decisionLetterSent.description: If true, a decision letter has been sent to the claimant regarding a benefit claim

developmentLetterSent.description: If true, a development letter has been sent to the claimant regarding a benefit claim

documentsNeeded.description: If true, the claim requires additional documents to be submitted

evidenceWaiverSubmitted5103.description: If true, indicates a decision has been requested and/or a Waiver 5103 has been submitted

errors.description: Error details if claim is in an errored state.

submitterApplicationCode.description: Application Code of benefit claim submitter

submitterRoleCode.description: Role Code of benefit claim submitter

supportingDocuments.description: Information regarding any supported documents attached to a claim

uploadDate.description: Date and time document was uploaded

closedDate.description: Date the tracked item was closed

requestedDate.description: Date the tracked item was requested

receivedDate.description: Date the tracked item was received

overdue.description: True if the item is overdue

status.description: Enum with the status of the tracked item

post.description: The below 526 schema is in a draft state representing the attributes we are currently planning to support. Changes are expected as we continue development.

claimDate.description: Date (or Timestamp with TimeZone) when claim is being submitted to the VA. Date cannot be in the future. UTC TimeZone is assumed unless otherwise specified.

claimantCertification.description: Claimant certifies and authorizes release of information.

veteranIdentification.description: Veteran Object being submitted in Claim

currentlyVaEmployee.description: Flag if Veteran is VA Employee.

emailAddress.description: Information associated with the Veteran's email address.

email.description: The most current email address of the Veteran.

agreeToEmailRelatedToClaim.description: Agreement to email information relating to this claim.

vaFileNumber.description: The file number associated with the Veteran and Veteran's Affairs.

mailingAddress.description: Current Mailing Address Object being submitted.

apartmentOrUnitNumber.description: Apartment or unit number for the address where the Veteran resides.

country.description: Country Veteran resides in.  Value must match the values returned by the "/countries" endpoint on the [Benefits Reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current).

changeOfAddress.description: A Change of Address Object being submitted.

dates.description: Important dates for the change of address action.

beginningDate.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD the Veteran changed address. Date must be in the future if change is temporary.

endingDate.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD the changed address expires, if change is temporary.

typeOfAddressChange.description: Temporary or Permanent change of address.

apartmentOrUnitNumber.description: New Additional Address Information Veteran resides in.

country.description: New country Veteran resides in. Value must match the values returned by the "/countries" endpoint on the [Benefits Reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current).

zipFirstFive.description: New zipcode (First 5 digits) Veteran resides in.

zipLastFour.description: New zipcode (Last 4 digits) Veteran resides in.

homeless.description: Object describing Veteran Homelessness if applicable.

pointOfContact.description: Point of contact in direct contact with Veteran.

telephone.description: Primary phone of Point of Contact.

internationalTelephone.description: international phone of Point of Contact.

homelessSituationOptions.description: Current state of the veteran's homelessness.

otherDescription.description: For a 'homelessSituationOptions' of value 'other', please provide additional comments on the living situation.
For a 'livingSituationOptions' of value 'other', please provide additional comments on the living situation.

gulfWarHazard.description: Toxic exposure related to the Gulf war.

servedInGulfWarHazardLocations.description: Did the Veteran serve in any of the following Gulf War hazard locations? Iraq; Kuwait; Saudi Arabia; the neutral zone between Iraq and Saudi Arabia; Bahrain; Qatar; the United Arab Emirates; Oman; Yemen; Lebanon; Somalia; Afghanistan; Israel; Egypt; Turkey; Syria; Jordan; Djibouti; Uzbekistan; the Gulf of Aden; the Gulf of Oman; the Persian Gulf; the Arabian Sea; and the Red Sea.

serviceDates.description: Date range for when the exposure happened.

startDate.description: Approximate start date for serving in Gulf War hazard location.

endDate.description: Approximate end date for serving in Gulf War hazard location.

herbicideHazardService.description: Toxic exposure related to herbicide hazards.

servedInHerbicideHazardLocations.description: Did the Veteran serve in any of the following Herbicide (e.g., Agent Orange) locations? These locations include: Republic of Vietnam to include the 12 nautical mile territorial waters; Thailand at any United States or Royal Thai base; Laos; Cambodia at Mimot or Krek; Kampong Cham Province; Guam or American Samoa; or in the territorial waters thereof; Johnston Atoll or a ship that called at Johnston Atoll; Korean demilitarized zone; aboard (to include repeated operations and maintenance with) a C-123 aircraft known to have been used to spray an herbicide agent (during service in the Air Force and Air Force Reserves).

serviceDates.description: Date range for when the exposure happened.

startDate.description: Approximate start date for serving in herbicide location.

endDate.description: Approximate end date for serving in herbicide location.

exposureDates.description: Date range for when the exposure happened.
Date range for when the exposure happened.

disabilities.description: Any current disabilities or symptoms the Veteran is claiming are related to their military service and/or are service-connected.

name.description: If classificationCode is included, the disability name is required to match the associated name value returned in the Benefits Reference Data /disabilities service.

classificationCode.description: The contention classification code can be retrieved from the Benefits Refence Data API. This code aligns with the id returned by the /disabilities service. If classificationCode is included, the disability name is required to match the associated name value returned in the /disabilities service.

serviceRelevance.description: Explanation of how the disability(ies) relates to the in-service event/exposure/injury.

approximateDate.description:
Approximate date disability began. Date must be in the past. 
 Format can be either MM-DD-YYYY or MM-YYYY

ratedDisabilityId.description: When submitting a contention with action type INCREASE, the previously rated disability id may be included.

diagnosticCode.description: The diagnosticCode is required if disabilityActionType is NONE and there are secondary disabilities included with the primary. The diagnosticCode must match an existing rated disability if disabilityActionType is NONE and there are secondary disabilities included with the primary.

disabilityActionType.description:
The status of the current disability.  
 If value is "INCREASE", then "ratedDisabilityId" and "diagnosticCode" are required.

secondaryDisabilities.description: Identifies the Secondary Service Disability information of the Veteran.

disabilityActionType.description: The status of the secondary disability.

serviceRelevance.description: Explanation of how the disability(ies) relates to the in-service event/exposure/injury.

approximateDate.description:
Approximate date disability began. 
 Format can be either MM-DD-YYYY or MM-YYYY

isRelatedToToxicExposure.description: Is the disability related to toxic exposures? If so, include exposure information.

exposureOrEventOrInjury.description: Type of exposure, event, or injury.

treatments.description: Identifies the Service Treatment information of the Veteran.

startDate.description: Start date for treatment. If treatment began from 2005 to present, you do not need to provide dates.

treatedDisabilityNames.description: Name(s) of Disabilities treated in this time frame.

center.description: VA Medical Center(s) and Department of Defense Military Treatment Facilities where the Veteran received treatment after discharge for any claimed disabilities.

name.description: Name of facility Veteran was treated in.

servicePeriods.description: Identifies the Service dates and Branch the Veteran served in.

enum: Army Air Corps or Army Air Force

activeDutyEndDate.description: Date Completed Active Duty.  If in the future, 'separationLocationCode' is required.

separationLocationCode.description: Code for the facility the Veteran plans to separate from.  Required if 'servicePeriod.activeDutyEndDate' is in the future. [Code values available here.](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-api/blob/master/modules/claims_api/lib/claims_api/separation_location_code_values.json)

title10Activation.description: Include if the Veteran is currently activated on federal orders within the National Guard or Reserves

anticipatedSeparationDate.description: Anticipated date of separation. Date must be in the future.

title10ActivationDate.description: Date cannot be in the future and must be after the earliest servicePeriod.activeDutyBeginDate.

alternateNames.description: List any other names under which the Veteran served, if applicable.

servedInActiveCombatSince911.description: Did Veteran serve in a combat zone since 9-11-2001?

servicePay.description: Details about Veteran receiving Service Pay from DoD.

favorTrainingPay.description: Is Veteran Waiving benefits to retain training pay.

favorMilitaryRetiredPay.description: Is Veteran Waiving benefits to retain Retiree pay.

futureMilitaryRetiredPay.description:
Will Veteran get Retiree pay in future?  
 If true, then "futurePayExplanation" attribute is required.

futureMilitaryRetiredPayExplanation.description: Explains why future pay will be received.

enum: Army Air Corps or Army Air Force

datePaymentReceived.description:
Approximate date separation pay was received. 
 Format can be either MM-DD-YYYY or MM-YYYY

enum: Army Air Corps or Army Air Force

directDeposit.description: Financial Direct Deposit information for Veteran.

accountType.description: Account type for the direct deposit.

accountNumber.description: Account number for the direct deposit.

routingNumber.description: Routing number for the direct deposit.

financialInstitutionName.description: Provide the name of the financial institution where the Veteran wants the direct deposit.

noAccount.description: Claimant certifies that they do not have an account with a financial institution or certified payment agent.

claimDate.description: Date of claim submission to be applied to signature on form 21-526EZ. Date cannot be in the future.

claimProcessType.description: Select type of claim program/process that applies to the Veteran.

claimantCertification.description: Claimant certifies and authorizes release of information.

currentlyVaEmployee.description: Set to true if Veteran is a VA employee.

emailAddress.description: Information associated with the Veteran's email address.

email.description: The most current email address of the Veteran.

agreeToEmailRelatedToClaim.description: Agreement to email information relating to this claim.

vaFileNumber.description: VA File Number associated to the Veteran.

numberAndStreet.description: Number and street, rural route, or P.O. Box for the Veteran's current mailing address.

apartmentOrUnitNumber.description: Apartment or unit number for the Veteran's current mailing address.

city.description: City for the Veteran's current mailing address.

country.description: Country for the Veteran's current mailing address.  Must match the values returned by the /countries endpoint on the [Benefits Reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current).

zipFirstFive.description: Zipcode (First 5 digits) for the Veteran's current mailing address.

zipLastFour.description: Zipcode (Last 4 digits) for the Veteran's current mailing address.

state.description: State for the Veteran's current mailing address.

beginningDate.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD the Veteran changed address. Date must be in the future if change is temporary.

endingDate.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD the changed address expires, if change is temporary.

typeOfAddressChange.description: Temporary or Permanent change of address.

numberAndStreet.description: Number and street, rural route, or P.O. Box for the Veteran's new address.

apartmentOrUnitNumber.description: Apartment or unit number for the Veteran's new address.

city.description: City for the Veteran's new address.

country.description: Country for the Veteran's new address. Value must match the values returned by the /countries endpoint on the [Benefits Reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current).

zipFirstFive.description: Zipcode (First 5 digits) for the Veteran's new address.

zipLastFour.description: Zipcode (Last 4 digits) for the Veteran's new address.

state.description: State for the Veteran's new address.

pointOfContact.description: Point of contact in direct contact with Veteran.

telephone.description: Primary phone of Point of Contact.

internationalTelephone.description: international phone of Point of Contact.

homelessSituationOptions.description: Current state of the veteran's homelessness.

otherDescription.description: For a 'homelessSituationOptions' of value 'other', please provide additional comments on the living situation.
For a 'livingSituationOptions' of value 'other', please provide additional comments on the living situation.

classificationCode.description: The contention classification code must match the associated id value returned in the /disabilities endpoint on the [Benefits Reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current). If 'classificationCode' is included, the disability 'name' must match the associated name value returned in the /disabilities endpoint.

Approximate date disability began. Date must be in the past.

diagnosticCode.description: The diagnosticCode is required if disabilityActionType is NONE and there are secondary disabilities included with the primary. The diagnosticCode must match an existing rated disability if disabilityActionType is NONE and there are secondary disabilities included with the primary.

The status of the current disability.  
 If value is "INCREASE", then "ratedDisabilityId" and "diagnosticCode" are required.

Code must match the values returned by the /intake-sites endpoint on the [Benefits reference Data API](https://developer.va.gov/explore/benefits/docs/benefits_reference_data?version=current).

Will the Veteran receive military retired pay pay in future?

post.description:
Test to make sure the form submission works with your parameters.
Submission validates against the schema returned by the GET /forms/526 endpoint.

Used to attach supporting documents for a 526 claim. For wet-signature PDFs, use the PUT /forms/526/{id} endpoint.

This endpoint accepts a document binary PDF as part of a multi-part payload (for example, attachment1, attachment2, attachment3).

attachment1.description: Attachment contents. Must be provided in binary PDF or [base64 string](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-api/master/modules/claims_api/spec/fixtures/base64pdf) format and less than 11 in x 11 in.

attachment2.description: Attachment contents. Must be provided in binary PDF or [base64 string](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-api/master/modules/claims_api/spec/fixtures/base64pdf) format and less than 11 in x 11 in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the claim being requested

get.summary: Returns last active Intent to File form submission for given 'type'.
get.description: Returns Veteran's last active Intent to File submission for given benefit type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of Intent to File to return. Available values - compensation, pension, survivor.

200.description: Successful response with active Intent to File

creationDate.description: Date the Intent to File was received at the VA

expirationDate.description: Date the Intent to File expires, this is 1 year from the createdDate

status.description: The status of the Intent to File

type.description: The type of Intent to File filed.

errors.title: Resource not found
errors.detail: No active 'compensation' intent to file found.

post.description: Establishes an Intent to File for disability compensation, pension, and survivor claims.

creationDate.description: Date the Intent to File was received at the VA

expirationDate.description: Date the Intent to File expires, this is 1 year from the createdDate

status.description: The status of the Intent to File

type.description: The type of Intent to File filed.

errors.title: invalid value for type
errors.detail: some-invalid-value is not valid for type

errors.title: Unprocessable Entity
errors.detail: Claimant SSN cannot be the same as veteran SSN for type 'survivor'

type.description: Type of Intent To File being submitted. For type "survivor", the request must include claimantSsn and be made by a valid Veteran Representative. If the Representative is not a Veteran or a VA employee, this method is currently not available to them, and they should use the Benefits Intake API as an alternative.

post.description: Validates an Intent to File for disability compensation, pension, and survivor claims.

status.description: The status of the Intent to File

errors.title: invalid value for type
errors.detail: some-invalid-value is not valid for type

type.description: Type of Intent To File being submitted. For type "survivor", the request must include claimantSsn and be made by a valid Veteran Representative. If the Representative is not a Veteran or a VA employee, this method is currently not available to them, and they should use the Benefits Intake API as an alternative.
